overview: Tuli is an orphan girl who tries to settle a home with the man she loves and Shyamol her husband also tries to give her full affection. But Shyamol's mother never accepted Tuli as her daughter-in-law. Tuli realized that there is no place for love in this society, all matters is a person's identity. Tuli tries to overcome everything but losses in this tug of war.
title: Shesh Chithi
